text: Sala Capriasca is a village and former municipality of the district Lugano in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. On 15 October 2001 the municipality was merged with the other, neighboring municipalities Cagiallo, Lopagno, Roveredo, Tesserete and Vaglio to form a new and larger municipality Capriasca.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 14 January 2010 == References == Category:Villages in Ticino Category:Former municipalities of Ticino
title: Sala Capriasca
